text: Ojo ƣajri naticai amalhoro intizorand? Ruze, ki naticai a'mol padidor savad, kasone, ki on ruzro az jod ʙurda ʙudand, megujand: «Pajomʙaroni Parvardigori mo ʙa xaq omadand. Ojo safe'one hastand, ki moro safo'at kunand? Jo on ki kase hast, ki moro ʙozgardovad to korhoi digare cuz on korho, ki mekardem, ancom dihem?» Ba xud zijon rasondand va on ʙutonro, ki ʙa duruƣ soxta ʙudand, inak az dast dodaand
